title: Siemens and Microsoft launch Industrial Copilot for manufacturing - Tech Monitor
summary: Siemens and Microsoft are partnering to bring an AI-powered assistant, Siemens Industrial Copilot, to the manufacturing industry. This Copilot will assist users with complex automation code, increasing efficiency and productivity across the industrial life cycle. The companies envision AI copilots assisting professionals in various industries, including manufacturing, infrastructure, transportation and healthcare.
green_innovation: TRUE, as the AI-powered assistant, Siemens Industrial Copilot, is designed to significantly improve human-machine collaboration in factories, leading to greater sustainability and reduced environmental impact.
business_innovation: TRUE, as the AI-powered assistant, Siemens Industrial Copilot, represents a new or improved business process (or combination thereof) that differs significantly from the firm's previous business processes.
